price: 60. Dan sekiranya Kami menghendaki, niscaya Kami jadikan malaikat-malaikat yang turun-temurun sebagai pengganti kamu di bumi.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lajaʿalnā minkum malāikatan fī al-arḍi yakhlufūna
